meanings.definition: A heavy vehicle with a roller used for compacting road surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The steamrollers smoothed the new road with their heavy rollers.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew brought in the steamrollers to flatten the asphalt.
meanings.sent3: The steamrollers had a race to see who could make the road the smoothest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a steamroller, crushing any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the steamrollers echoed through the neighborhood as they worked.

meanings.definition: To crush or flatten with a steamroller.
meanings.sent1: He carefully steamrollers the clay to make it flat for his project.
meanings.sent2: The steamroller will steamrollers the old building to make space for the new one.
meanings.sent3: She steamrollers the dough with precision to create the perfect crust.
meanings.sent4: The team steamrollersed their opponents in the final game of the season.
meanings.sent5: The chef steamrollersed the garlic to release its flavor into the dish.

meanings.definition: To proceed with relentless force or determination.
meanings.sent1: The team steamrollersed through the competition to win the championship.
meanings.sent2: The project manager decided to steamrollers ahead with the plan despite the challenges.
meanings.sent3: The toddler steamrollersed towards the toy store, determined to get a new toy.
meanings.sent4: Her words steamrollersed through the silence, leaving everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The storm steamrollersed across the landscape, leaving destruction in its wake.
